resources.string:
1. Press the "Find network button."

 A search for the network SmartQuilt shall begin 

 2. A message will pop up on success and 

 you will now be connected to the Quilt.
Steps to connecting to your Quilt.
Connection Failed, Please try again or check if the network "SmartQuilt" \n\n appears on your list of available wifi connections.
Wifi is off, please turn your wifi on then try again.
Data has been retrieved from the SmartQuilt.
